name: QTIQuiz Creator
description: This Chrome extension streamlines quiz creation for Canvas. It helps you generate multiple choice questions in JSON format using AI tools like ChatGPT, convert them to QTI-compatible zip files, and easily import them into Canvas. Ideal for educators looking to save time and automate quiz setup. (Note: Currently does not support images, code snippets, or math expressions.)
author: Keshav Bhandari
